Title: New, Bronze Batman Half Hunter Quartz Pocket Watch + Neck Chain, Gift Boxed!
Description: Bronze Batman Half Hunter Quartz Pocket Watch & Neck Chain - Antique Style, High Quality - Original Quartz Movement - Batman Cover Design - Bronze Colored Stainless Steel Case - Decorated Ornate Back Design - Half Hunter Closure - Acrylic Lens - Push Button Functions Open/Close - White Dial Face, Black Fancy Hour/Minute/Sweep Hand - Arabic Numerals, 12-Hour Dial - Matching Bronze Detachable 30" Chain - Extra Battery Included (When battery runs out, simply pop off the back cover by using a flat object and insert new battery) - Overall Dimension: 1 3/4" Diameter Package Includes: 1 Pocket Watch 1 Chain 1 Extra Battery 1 Gift Box My items sold are handmade, brand new or in pre-owned vintage condition and sold as specified. Vintage items I sell are 20 years or more and are considered a piece of history. Vintage jewelry by nature will have some light wear, imperfections and/or signs of use and age. All of my items come from a smoke and pet free home. Payment: Sorry, I do not accept PayPal. I have a Verified Merchant Account through Authorize.net. Your payment is 100% secure and is backed up by ebay. Visa, MasterCard, Discover and American Express are the only methods of payment accepted. Payment needs to be received within 3 days of the end of auction. This also applies to combined orders. Please note: "Unpaid Item Assistance" cases will automatically be opened after 3 days without payment. Once they are opened, eBay allows an additional 4 days for you to pay, which will then close the case with no penalty to your account. Shipping: I ship USPS the same day or next day. Holiday or weekend, item(s) ship the next business day. The items are placed in a nice gift box and mailed in a protective, bubble-padded envelope. Returns: I offer a 30 day, 100% full refund, if not satisfied. Return shipping is the buyer’s responsibility. Item must be returned in the same condition as shipped. You will receive a full refund once the item is received. Please shop my store with confidence. If you have any questions or issues, feel free to contact me anytime. Please send me a message before going through the resolution center, I will resolve it to your satisfaction. I strive to deliver a 5-Star Customer Service. Your honest feedback will help me become a better seller. Thank You!
